title: Automation Module Type Definitions
description: This schema is used for verification of JSON objects used for creation of Automation Module Types.

triggers.title: Trigger Module Types
triggers.description: Container for Trigger Module Types used to create the Trigger Modules of the Rule.

items.title: Trigger Module Type
items.description: Definition of the Trigger Module Type.

uid.title: Trigger UID
uid.description: Unique identifier of the Trigger Module Type.

visibility.title: Visibility
visibility.description: Defines visibility of the Module Type.

label.title: Trigger Label
label.description: Short(one word) user friendly description of the Trigger Module Type.

description.title: Trigger Description
description.description: A brief description of what the Trigger is and for what it is used.

tags.title: Module Type Tags
tags.description: Non-hierarchical keywords or terms describing the Module Type. They help to classify the module types and allow them to be found.

items.title: Tag
items.description: Keyword or term describing the Module Type.

configDescriptions.title: Trigger Configuration Descriptor
configDescriptions.description: Used to describe the configuration parameters of the Trigger.

items.title: Configuration Parameter Description
items.description: Description of property for configuring the Module.

name.title: Configuration Parameter Name
name.description: Identifies uniquely the configuration parameter in scope of the Trigger Type(must neither be null nor empty).

type.title: Configuration Parameter Type
type.description: Property declaring the data type of the configuration parameter.

label.title: Configuration Parameter Label
label.description: A human understandable label of the Configuration Parameter.

description.title: Configuration Parameter Description
description.description: A human understandable description of the Configuration Parameter.

required.title: Required Configuration Parameter
required.description: Specifies whether the value is required.

min.title: Configuration Parameter Minimum Allowed Value
min.description: The minimal value for numeric types, or the minimal length of strings, or the minimal number of selected options.

max.title: Configuration Parameter Maximum Allowed Value
max.description: The maximal value for numeric types, or the maximal length of strings, or the maximal number of selected options.

step.title: Configuration Parameter Step
step.description: The value granularity for a numeric value

pattern.title: Configuration Parameter Pattern
pattern.description: The regular expression for a text type.

readOnly.title: Readable Configuration Parameter
readOnly.description: Specifies whether the value is read-only.

multiple.title: Multiple Configuration Parameter
multiple.description: Specifies whether multiple selections of options are allowed.

multipleLimit.title: Multiple Configuration Parameter Limit
multipleLimit.description: Specifies the maximum number of options that can be selected when multiple is true.

context.title: Configuration Parameter Context
context.description: Serves to determine how to treat the value of the Configuration Parameter.

default.title: Configuration Parameter Default Value
default.description: Declaring a default value for the Configuration Parameter if missing.

unit.title: Configuration Parameter Unit
unit.description: Specifies the unit of measurements for the configuration parameter.

unitLabel.title: Configuration Parameter Unit Label
unitLabel.description: Specifies the unit label for the configuration parameter. This attribute can also be used to provide natural language units as iterations, runs, etc.

filterCriteria.title: Configuration Parameter Filter
filterCriteria.description: Criteria for dynamic selection of values.

options.title: Configuration Parameter Options
options.description: List of definitions of the parameter for static selection.

limitToOptions.title: limit To Options
limitToOptions.description: Specifies that the users input is limited to the options list. When set to true without options, this should have no affect. When set to true with options, the user can only select the options from the list When set to false with options, the user can enter values other than those in the list.

groupName.title: Configuration Parameter Group Name
groupName.description: A string used to group parameters together into logical blocks so that the UI can display them together.

advanced.title: An Advanced Configuration Parameter
advanced.description: Specifies if this is an advanced parameter. An advanced parameter can be hidden in the UI to focus the user on important configuration.

children.title: Trigger Modules
children.description: Contains definitions of the Trigger Modules of the Trigger Composition.

items.title: Trigger Module
items.description: Defines the fact which triggers the Rule execution.

id.title: Trigger ID
id.description: Identifies uniquely the Module in scope of the Composite Module Type.

type.title: Trigger Module Type UID
type.description: Identifies the Module Type used for creation of the Trigger Module. Must be unique in scope of concrete Trigger Composition.

configuration.title: Trigger Configuration
configuration.description: Used to define values for the configuration parameters of the Trigger Module.

label.title: Trigger Module Label
label.description: A human understandable label of the Trigger Module.

description.title: Trigger Module Description
description.description: A human understandable description of the Trigger Module.

outputs.title: Trigger Outputs
outputs.description: Container for Trigger Outputs used to bring data to the other Modules of the Rule.

items.title: Trigger Output
items.description: Output object of the Trigger used to transfer data to other Modules of the Rule.

type.description: Fully qualified name of Java class or a human understandable text.

label.description: A human understandable label of the output

description.description: A human understandable description of the output

defaultValue.description: The value that will be used in case of missing dynamic output

reference.description: Specifies what part of the given value will be used.

items.description: A key word used for auto-mapping the output to available inputs. Shows how to be considered a given value.

tags.description: Shows how to be considered a given value. For example, as a Temperature.

conditions.title: Condition Module Types
conditions.description: Container for Condition Module Types used to create the Condition Modules of the Rule.

items.title: Condition Module Type
items.description: Definition of the Condition Module Type.

uid.title: Condition UID
uid.description: Unique identifier of the Condition Module Type.

visibility.title: Visibility
visibility.description: Defines visibility of the Module Type.

label.title: Condition Label
label.description: Short(one word) user friendly description of the Condition Module Type.

description.title: Condition Designation
description.description: A brief description of what the Condition is and for what it is used.

tags.title: Module Type Tags
tags.description: Non-hierarchical keywords or terms describing the Module Type. They help to classify the module types and allow them to be found.

items.title: Tag
items.description: Keyword or term describing the Module Type.

configDescriptions.title: Condition Configuration Descriptor
configDescriptions.description: Used to describe the configuration parameters of the Condition.

items.title: Configuration Parameter Description
items.description: Describes the configuration Parameter for configuring the Module.

name.title: Configuration Parameter Name
name.description: Identifies uniquely the configuration parameter in scope of the Condition Type(must neither be null nor empty).

type.title: Configuration Parameter Type
type.description: Property declaring the data type of the configuration parameter.

label.title: Configuration Parameter Label
label.description: A human understandable label of the Configuration Parameter.

description.title: Configuration Parameter Description
description.description: A human understandable description of the Configuration Parameter.

required.title: Required Configuration Parameter
required.description: Specifies whether the value is required.

min.title: Configuration Parameter Minimum Allowed Value
min.description: The minimal value for numeric types, or the minimal length of strings, or the minimal number of selected options.

max.title: Configuration Parameter Maximum Allowed Value
max.description: The maximal value for numeric types, or the maximal length of strings, or the maximal number of selected options.

step.title: Configuration Parameter Step
step.description: The value granularity for a numeric value

pattern.title: Configuration Parameter Pattern
pattern.description: The regular expression for a text type.

readOnly.title: Readable Configuration Parameter
readOnly.description: Specifies whether the value is read-only.

multiple.title: Multiple Configuration Parameter
multiple.description: Specifies whether multiple selections of options are allowed.

multipleLimit.title: Multiple Configuration Parameter Limit
multipleLimit.description: Specifies the maximum number of options that can be selected when multiple is true.

context.title: Configuration Parameter Context
context.description: Serves to determine how to treat the value of the Configuration Parameter.

default.title: Configuration Parameter Default Value
default.description: Declaring a default value for the Configuration Parameter if missing.

unit.title: Configuration Parameter Unit
unit.description: Specifies the unit of measurements for the configuration parameter.

unitLabel.title: Configuration Parameter Unit Label
unitLabel.description: Specifies the unit label for the configuration parameter. This attribute can also be used to provide natural language units as iterations, runs, etc.

filterCriteria.title: Configuration Parameter Filter
filterCriteria.description: Criteria for dynamic selection of values.

options.title: Configuration Parameter Options
options.description: List of definitions of the parameter for static selection.

limitToOptions.title: limit To Options
limitToOptions.description: Specifies that the users input is limited to the options list. When set to true without options, this should have no affect. When set to true with options, the user can only select the options from the list When set to false with options, the user can enter values other than those in the list.

groupName.title: Configuration Parameter Group Name
groupName.description: A string used to group parameters together into logical blocks so that the UI can display them together.

advanced.title: An Advanced Configuration Parameter
advanced.description: Specifies if this is an advanced parameter. An advanced parameter can be hidden in the UI to focus the user on important configuration.

children.title: Condition Modules
children.description: Contains definitions of the Condition Modules of the Condition Composition.

items.title: Condition Module
items.description: A brief description of what the Condition is and for what it is used.

id.title: Condition uid
id.description: Identifies uniquely the Module in scope of the Rule.

label.title: Condition Label
label.description: Short (one word) user friendly name of the Module.

description.title: Condition Description
description.description: A brief description of what the Condition is and for what it is used.

type.title: Condition Module Type UID
type.description: Identifies the Module Type used for creation of the Condition.

configuration.title: Condition Configuration
configuration.description: Used to define values of the configuration parameters of the Condition.

inputs.title: Condition Input
inputs.description: Contains pairs of Input Name and Output reference in format - Module ID : Output Name.

inputs.title: Condition Inputs
inputs.description: Container for Condition Inputs used to get data from the Trigger Modules of the Rule.

items.title: Condition Input
items.description: Input object of the Condition used for binding an Output objects of other modules in order to receive data.

type.description: Fully qualified name of Java class or a human understandable text.

label.description: A human understandable label of the input

defaultValue.description: The value that will be used in case of missing dynamic input

description.description: A human understandable description of the input

items.description: A key word used for auto-mapping the input to available outputs. Shows how to be considered a given value.

tags.description: Shows how to be considered a given value. For example, as a Temperature.

required.description: Shows how to be treated the given default value - be used in case of missing dynamic input or not.

reference.description: Specifies what part of the given value will be used.

tags.title: Module Type Tags

children.title: Action Modules
children.description: Contains definitions of the Action Modules of the Action Composition.

items.title: Action Module
items.description: A brief description of what the Action is and for what it is used.

id.title: Action ID
id.description: Identifies uniquely the Module in scope of the Rule.

label.title: Action Label
label.description: Short (one word) user friendly name of the Module.

description.title: Action Description
description.description: A brief description of what the Action is and for what it is used.

type.title: Action Module Type UID
type.description: Identifies the Module Type used for creation of the Action.

configuration.title: Action Configuration
configuration.description: Used to define values of the configuration parameters of the Action.

inputs.title: Action Input
inputs.description: Contains pairs of Input Name and Output reference in format - Module ID : Output Name.

outputs.title: Action Output
outputs.description: Contains pairs of Output Name and Output reference. The reference defines what part of a complex data has to be used as value of this output.

inputs.title: Action Inputs
inputs.description: Container for Action Inputs used to get data from the other Modules of the Rule.

items.title: Action Input
items.description: Input object of the Action used for binding an Output objects of other modules in order to receive data.

type.description: Fully qualified name of Java class or a human understandable text.

label.description: A human understandable label of the input

defaultValue.description: The value that will be used in case of missing dynamic input

description.description: A human understandable description of the input

items.description: A key word used for auto-mapping the input to available outputs. Shows how to be considered a given value.

tags.description: Shows how to be considered a given value. For example, as a Temperature.

required.description: Shows how to be treated the given default value - be used in case of missing dynamic input or not.

reference.description: Specifies what part of the given value will be used.

outputs.title: Action Outputs
outputs.description: Container for Action Outputs used to bring data to the other Action Modules of the Rule.

items.title: Action Output
items.description: Output object of the Action used to transfer data to other Action Modules of the Rule.

type.description: Fully qualified name of Java class or a human understandable text.

label.description: A human understandable label of the output

description.description: A human understandable description of the output

defaultValue.description: The value that will be used in case of missing dynamic output

tags.description: Shows how to be considered a given value. For example, as a Temperature.
